com.izforge.izpack.panels
Class ProcessPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  com.izforge.izpack.installer.IzPanel
                      com.izforge.izpack.panels.ProcessPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
AbstractUIHandler, AbstractUIProcessHandler, javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class ProcessPanel
extends IzPanel
implements AbstractUIProcessHandler

The process panel class. This class allows external processes to be executed during installation. Parts of the code have been taken from CompilePanel.java and modified a lot.

Author:
Tino Schwarze, Julien Ponge
See Also:
Serialized Form
